name: T-Mobile First Responders Discount
description: Up to 50% off family lines, 20% off Magenta MAX plans
fullDescription: T-Mobile offers special pricing on wireless plans for first responders including firefighters, police, EMTs, paramedics, and 911 dispatchers.
whatTheyOffer:
- 50% off family lines (up to 6 lines on Magenta)
- 20% off Magenta MAX plans
- Netflix included on some plans
- No annual service contract
- 5G network access
howToGetIt:
1. Visit T-Mobile store or website
2. Select First Responders plan option
3. Verify employment status
4. Provide proof of first responder role
5. Discount applied automatically
